examples.full_description: AuthorsController showing an author shows an author
AuthorsController creating a valid author creates successfully
AuthorsController creating a valid author redirects to show page
AuthorsController creating an invalid author does not create

examples.description: has an error for missing name
examples.full_description: AuthorsController creating an invalid author has an error for missing name

examples.description: has an error for non-unique email
examples.full_description: AuthorsController creating an invalid author has an error for non-unique email
AuthorsController creating an invalid author renders the form again

exception.message: Validation failed: Name can't be blank, Email has already been taken

examples.full_description: PostsController showing a post shows a post
PostsController making valid updates updates successfully
PostsController making valid updates redirects to show page

examples.description: has an error for missing title
examples.full_description: PostsController making invalid updates has an error for missing title

exception.message: SQLite3::ConstraintException: UNIQUE constraint failed: posts.id: INSERT INTO "posts" ("id", "content", "category", "created_at", "updated_at") VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

examples.description: has an error for too short content
examples.full_description: PostsController making invalid updates has an error for too short content

exception.message: SQLite3::ConstraintException: UNIQUE constraint failed: posts.id: INSERT INTO "posts" ("id", "content", "category", "created_at", "updated_at") VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

examples.description: has an error for invalid category
examples.full_description: PostsController making invalid updates has an error for invalid category

exception.message: SQLite3::ConstraintException: UNIQUE constraint failed: posts.id: INSERT INTO "posts" ("id", "content", "category", "created_at", "updated_at") VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

examples.full_description: PostsController making invalid updates controller actions does not update

exception.message:
expected: value != "too short"
     got: "too short"

(compared using ==)

examples.full_description: PostsController making invalid updates controller actions renders the form again

exception.message: expecting <"edit"> but was a redirect to <http://test.host/posts/1>
